required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 10, 2017
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Randomized Clinical Trial of Bococizumab (PF-04950615; RN316) in Subjects With Primary Hyperlipidemia or Mixed Dyslipidemia At Risk Of Cardiovascular Events
clinical_study.official_title: A 52 Week Phase 3 Double-blind, Randomized, Placebo-controlled, Parallel-group Study To Assess The Efficacy, Safety And Tolerability Of Pf-04950615 In Subjects With Primary Hyperlipidemia Or Mixed Dyslipidemia At Risk Of Cardiovascular Events

brief_summary.textblock: This study is a multicenter, double-blind, randomized study to access the efficacy, safety and tolerability of Bococizumab (PF-04950615; RN316) in subjects with hyperlipidemia receiving background statin therapy.

primary_outcome.measure: Percent Change from Baseline in fasting LDL-C at week 12.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in fasting Lipid Parameters at Week 12.
secondary_outcome.description: Percent change in fasting Total Cholesterol (TC), Apolipoprotein B (Apo B), non HDL-C, LDL-C by TG level (<or>=200 mg/dL), Lipoprotein (a) (Lp(a), High Density Lipoprotein (HDL), Triglyceride, ApoA-I, ApoA-II and VLDL-C blood concentrations.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in fasting Lipid Parameters at Week 24.
secondary_outcome.description: Percent change in fasting LDL-C, Percent change in fasting Total Cholesterol (TC), Apolipoprotein B (Apo B), non HDL-C, LDL-C by TG level (<or>=200 mg/dL), Lipoprotein (a) (Lp(a), High Density Lipoprotein (HDL), Triglyceride, ApoA-I, ApoA-II and VLDL-C blood concentrations.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in fasting Lipid Parameters at Week 52.
secondary_outcome.description: Percent change in fasting LDL-C, Percent change in fasting Total Cholesterol (TC), Apolipoprotein B (Apo B), non HDL-C, LDL-C by TG level (<or>=200 mg/dL), Lipoprotein (a) (Lp(a), High Density Lipoprotein (HDL), Triglyceride, ApoA-I, ApoA-II and VLDL-C blood concentrations.

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of subjects achieving fasting LDL-C <=100 mg/dL and <=70 mg/dL at week 12.
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of subjects achieving fasting LDL-C <=100 mg/dL and <=70 mg/dL at week 12

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of subjects achieving fasting LDL-C <=100 mg/dL and <=70 mg/dL at week 24.
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of subjects achieving fasting LDL-C <=100 mg/dL and <=70 mg/dL at week 24.

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of subjects achieving fasting LDL-C <=100 mg/dL and <=70 mg/dL at week 52.
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of subjects achieving fasting LDL-C <=100 mg/dL and <=70 mg/dL at week 52

intervention.description: 150 mg every 2 weeks, subcutaneous injection for 52 weeks.
Subcutaneous injection every 2 weeks for 52 weeks.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Treated with a statin
- Fasting LDL-C >=100 mg/dL and triglyceride <= 400 mg/dL
- High or very high risk of incurring a cardiovascular event
Exclusion Criteria:
- Pregnant or breastfeeding females
- Cardiovascular or cerebrovascular event or procedure within 90 days
- Congestive heart failure NYHA class IV
- Poorly controlled hypertension
